page.title: 03 Colyford Village
page.content: {Colyford}is another small village not far from Seaton. There is a Post Office store and Butchery. Also in Colyford there is a Filling Station that sells petrol, motoring equipment, sweets, ice-creams, etc. Again there is hardly any transport to Seaton except for the Axe Valley Mini Travel and the Tramway. The people of Colyford also rely on holiday traffic as there are three restaurants in Colyford. The Landlord of the White Hart Inn is very concerned, as people use his toilets without going in the Bar, because his toilets are the only ones on the main road between Lyme Regis and Sidford.
